featured.quote: Mr. Dongcheol is the most exemplary and outstanding tech leader I have ever worked with. I gained extensive knowledge, particularly in large-scale systems and on-premise environments. The toolkit he provided to the company was incredibly user-friendly, greatly benefiting many junior developers.
featured.author: Hyunkyu Lee

testimonials.text: 신동철팀장님께서는 의료 분야 소프트웨어 엔지니어로서 필요한 의료 도메인 지식을 넓고 깊게 알고 계십니다. 리드 프로그래머로서 책임감을 가지고 프로그램을 개발하면서도, 아래 직급의 사람이 의견을 내도 타당할 경우 해당내용을 수용해주시며 다른 팀원들의 실력 향상을 위해 노력하십니다.
testimonials.author: 박석준

testimonials.text: A great senior software engineer with specialty in large system architecture designs based on microservices. He's open to learn new skills and capable to apply them to real-world projects. His extensive experience has helped me many times in finding solutions.
testimonials.author: Hyunjin Song

testimonials.text: Ability to provide a big direction for co-workers to solve problems on their own is excellent. He has a lot of experience and deep knowledge in medical software, especially dentistry. He is always trying to learn new skills, and has no fear or reluctance to apply new skills.
testimonials.author: Gyeong Uk Min

testimonials.text: The most thoughtful C++ engineer I've ever worked with. I worked with him to integrate the AI modules written in Python into the C++ program. Writing comprehensible code and building programs to make it easier to maintain are the most distinctive of his many specialties.
testimonials.author: junyaup Kim

testimonials.text: One of the best engineers I have seen. Writing up a Database Service from scratch in a short term is quite an accomplishment and Mr Shin did it with ease. He has pushed himself all the time to perform better and has continuously achieved better results during his tenure with us at Samsung.
testimonials.author: Nasir Ahmed Desai

testimonials.text: A very talented person with deep technical knowledge. He joined DICOM Platform team and took over a challenging component right away. He went ahead and optimized the performance spec by 2x. His communication skills are well appreciated.
testimonials.author: Rakesh Dutta

testimonials.text: He always tries to learn about new technologies and apply them to his work. The project to develop new dental imaging server and application based on microservices was successful in performance, scalability and maintainability. I'm sure he would be a good teammate on any development team.
testimonials.author: Chulhyun(Charles) Lee

testimonials.text: Excellent capabilities in the field of large-capacity transmission or real-time processing. He also likes to acquire new skills and reflect them in projects. He never neglects his efforts to improve his code. I got a lot of inspiration collaborating with him on medical image transmission.
testimonials.author: DongKeun Kang

testimonials.text: A lot of experiences in medical imaging field and a very well trained programmer. Most of all, he is eager for knowledge. So he can be very good in adopting new technologies. I recommend him in general application programming and medical imaging field.
testimonials.author: 이우석
